tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.eternallyBound1: §5Once worn, it becomes a part of you.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.eternallyBound2: §4This ring will persist with you forever.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.eternallyBound2_: §6With the power of god, you can unequip it.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRing3: §dSeven curses will befall whoever bears it:
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRing4: §5- You receive double damage from §6ANY§5 source.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRing5: §5- Neutral creatures are aggressive towards you.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRing7: §5- Monsters receive §6%1$s§5 less damage from you.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRing8: §5- When on fire, you burn forever.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRing9: §5- Every death tears your soul apart.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRing11: §dSeven blessings will reward those who withstand:
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRing18: §5- You can create and use unique relics.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRingLore1: §5Once forged by antediluvian god, it beckons
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRingLore2: §5mortals and higher beings alike with promise
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRingLore4: §5Be it arrogance or ignorance that leads them
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRingLore5: §5to believe they can harness ring's power,
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedRingLore6: §5both are paid for in suffering the extent of
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedOnesOnly1: Only those who bear the Seven Curses
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.cursedOnesOnly2: hold power to obtain and use this item.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.worthyOnesOnly1: §5The sacrifice necessary to acquire this item
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.worthyOnesOnly2: §5is immense - you have to spend §699.5%§5 of your
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.worthyOnesOnly3: §5time in the world suffering the §6Seven Curses§5.
tooltip.enigmaticlegacy.worthyOnesOnly4: For now, your time measures at:
message.enigmaticlegacy.cursed_sleep: Seven Curses awaken unspeakable fear and gnawing uncertainty within as you approach the tempting realm of dreams. No hope for the hopeless, no sleep for the sleepless...
